original: intros A R xs p ys l H1 H2. revert xs ys l H1. induction xs as [|x xs' IH]; intros ys l H1 H2. - simpl. intros H3. rewrite H3. auto. - intros H3. destruct l as [|y l']. + inversion H3. + simpl in H2. simpl in H3. inversion H2; subst. inversion H3; subst. apply and_comm. split. * intros a H4. apply H0. simpl. right. apply H4. * apply IH with (xs := xs') (p := p) (ys := ys) in H0. { apply H0. } { apply H2. } { apply H3. }
